feed.title: Ilija Lazarevic
feed.subtitle: My personal blog where I share my posts about artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science, programming, and various thoughts.

entry.title: Wholesome blog about daily digests
entry.content:
As stated in the description of this blog post, I want to start sharing my work, snippets, adventures, and thoughts with you, yes you!

Well, I had an idea about putting up the poster of Uncle Sam, but.. heck, that would be too much. Let’s keep it quiet…er.
entry.summary: This is my first blog in a series about everything I do and part of what I think.
